name: Cistercian Numerals Quiz
description:
This is a simple "guess the number" quiz. The game will give you a random number (up to 4 digits), and you will have to guess what the number is.  If you guess correctly the game will generate a new number. If you guess wrong then you can try again. The goal is to get as many numbers in a row as possible and beat your previous high score. 

  • Press 'G' to give up and get the answer.
  • Press 'N' to generate a new number.

(Both of these actions will reset your score)

There is a guide on how to decipher the numbers on here, but try not to use it! 

You can read more about Cistercian numbers on Wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cistercian_numerals

Mac and Web Version coming soon (hopefully!)
